recipesJson.name: Anzac Cookie
recipesJson.author: PonPonPataPon
recipesJson.description:
An Australian iconic biscuit/cookie with heavy notes of Golden syrup and oats. I'm not sure if there is a US equivalent to this 

Biscuit Base
(INW) Biscuit and (Cap) Sugar cookie really make up the bulk of this note, with the (FA) Cookie adding a bit more depth to the Biscuit Base

Golden Syrup
(FA) Maple syrup really is the main note here. The (FA) Honey just adds a little to it

Give it a few days to steep so the custard and almond really bridge the syrup and biscuit
